description:
When young adventurer http://anidb.net/ch132540 [Laios] and his company are attacked and soundly thrashed by a dragon deep in a dungeon, the party loses all its money and provisions...and a member! They`re eager to go back and save her, but there is just one problem: If they set out with no food or coin to speak of, they`re sure to starve on the way! But Laios comes up with a brilliant idea: "Let`s eat the monsters!" Slimes, basilisks, and even dragons...none are safe from the appetites of these dungeon-crawling gourmands!
Source: Yen Press
Note: The first three episodes received a three-week advance screening run in Japan starting on December 8, 2023. Also, the first episode was screened at AnimagiC Mannheim in Germany on August 5, 2023. The regular broadcast started on January 4, 2024.

REGULAR.description:
After a crushing loss, Laios, Marcille, and Chilchuck quickly reenter the dungeon to save Falin, but this time, they have a foolproof survival plan.
Source: Netflix

After waking up to a tantalizing smell, Marcille receives a lecture from Senshi on a balanced diet. The crew helps an adventurer poisoned by a basilisk.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: ローストバジリスク / オムレツ / かき揚げ

REGULAR.description:
Laios and crew access a hidden area guarded by mysterious Living Armor, who appear to be protecting something potentially delicious.
Source: Netflix

Reaching the third level of the dungeon, Senshi leads the crew to his secret vegetable garden. Later, they are accosted by a band of angry, desperate orcs.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: キャベツ煮 / オーク

REGULAR.description:
As another group of adventurers discovers a treasure box, a swarm of bone-chilling ghosts chases Laios and his crew. Senshi, however, has a sweet plan.
Source: Netflix

A starving Laios angers a mysterious elf while hunting for food in Living Paintings. Later, Chilchuck finds himself trapped with a crabby Mimic.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Court Cuisine / Boiled in Salt Water

REGULAR.description:
Something`s fishy on this new dungeon level! The crew crosses a treacherous lake, encountering vicious seafood and fallen adventurers along the way.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: 水棲馬 / 雑炊 / 蒲焼き

REGULAR.description:
Marcille recalls when she first met Falin as young students. After a quick wash up, an inadvertent misstep lands her in deep water with an angry spirit.
Source: Netflix

The smell of meat lures in uninvited guests — among them, a familiar face emerges. To move forward, they must work together to defeat the Undine.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: テンタクルス / シチュー

REGULAR.description:
The crew avoid a stinging descent to the castle town, where the Red Dragon lurks. But to defeat it, they need a tight plan — and a morale-boosting meal.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: 大ガエル / 地上にて

REGULAR.description:
The crew finally faces the Red Dragon, but their grand strategy quickly unravels. With the beast`s fury escalating, who will get the final bite?
Source: Netflix

A desperate search within the dragon`s stomach leads to a gruesome discovery, revealing that resurrection magic alone won`t be enough to restore Falin.
Source: Netflix

Falin starts acting strange in the middle of the night, leading Laios and crew to a menacing figure who wants them gone.
Source: Netflix

Back in an upper dungeon level, Kabru and crew wake up to find their supplies missing and are ambushed on their way back to the surface.
Source: Netflix

Trapped in the dungeon, a concerned Senshi cooks up a nourishing meal for the famished crew — giving Marcille enough energy to come up with a plan.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: ドライアド / コカトリス

REGULAR.description:
Chilchuck figures out a way to escape the dungeon, but their ascent is halted by an unexpected encounter with an old friend in dire need of sustenance.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: 掃除屋 / みりん干し

REGULAR.description:
The parties must band together to fend off an attack by vicious Harpies — but the unexpected appearance of a transformed Falin stuns everyone.
Source: Netflix

While in pursuit of Falin, Laios and crew seek shelter from a blizzard but are overrun by Shapeshifter copies of themselves. How will they spot the fakes?
Source: Netflix

The crew is cornered by an acquaintance who demands help with a beastly problem. Later, Laios enters Marcille`s nightmare and discovers her greatest fear.
Source: Netflix

Izutsumi proves to be a useful ally despite her lousy table manners — and aversion to eating monsters. But the crew`s kindness slowly opens her up.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: アイスゴーレム / バロメッツ

REGULAR.description:
With the dungeon`s fate hanging in the balance, Kabru negotiates with the elves. Meanwhile, a ghost drags Laios and crew into the cursed Golden Country.
Source: Netflix

Leaving the safety of the Golden Country, Senshi ends up in the clutches of a ferocious griffin. The crew must summon help if they want to save him.
Source: Netflix

Back at camp, Senshi finally reveals his painful history with the dungeon. The next day, the crew is rudely awakened by a perplexing transformation.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: グリフィンのスープ / ダンプリング1

REGULAR.description:
Still wrestling with their new forms, the crew must overcome the gargoyles. Later, they descend deeper into the dungeon. What monsters will they try next?
Source: Netflix

titles.title: ダンプリング2 / ベーコンエッグ
Behind the Scenes of the Opening
ナイキングドキュメンタリー OP制作
Behind the Scenes of the Voice Recording
ナイキングドキュメンタリー アフレコ

ナイキングドキュメンタリー 音楽
Visual Commentary of Delicious in Dungeon
สูตรลับตำรับดันเจียน
